message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which holds immense value for me. It's worth more than $100 to me, but I understand its true worth may vary depending on your needs and preferences. To make this opportunity appealing, I propose selling it to you for $120. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring you receive a high-quality item while also compensating for its intrinsic value. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget and expectations.
